description: Earned CompTIA Linux+ certification, proving expertise in Linux system administration, server management, and open-source-based system security.
Developing IoT devices to detect carbon monoxide, sulfur dioxide, humidity, and temperature in the surrounding environment, to increase awareness and mitigate air pollution risks.
Design and implement an IoT device to monitor air quality with sensors for carbon monoxide, sulfur dioxide, and other environmental parameters for smart environment solutions.
Achieved the MikroTik Certified Network Associate (MTCNA) certification, with competencies in network configuration, routing management, firewalls, and troubleshooting of MikroTik devices.
Developed and implemented cloud-based APIs and deployments using Google Cloud Platform (GCP) for scalable and efficient cloud computing solutions.
